unnormalised: Mhunnllear, kalpoon ghe ek robot butler tuka *gajar ka halwa* bhettoita ‚Äì tem bhavisya, mhojea ixtta! Sodeak, choddxea utpadon kendramni robotic hat vaprun prakria otomatik kortat. Maruti Suzuki sarkhea zageanim bhari gunthovnuk kelya, somestponni utpadokta sumar 25% vaddoita, kiteak tori odik, hanvem tem Livemintacher vo kaslean vachlem. Ani "chalta hai" bhavna naka, hankaar?
normalised: Mhunnllear, ek robot butler tuka gajaracho halvo dita mhunn chint, tem bhavishy, mhojea ixtta! Sodeak, zaiteo utpadon plant robotik arms vaprun processes automatic kortat. Maruti Suzuki sarkhea zagear bhorpur invest kela, kiteak efficiency sumar ponchis percent vaddtta, kiteakoi odhik, hanvem Livemint vo koslench tannem vachlem. Ani "chalta hai" attitude naka, mhunnllear borench na?
text: Mhunnllear, kalpoon ghe ek robot butler tuka *gajar ka halwa* bhettoita ‚Äì tem bhavisya, mhojea ixtta! Sodeak, choddxea utpadon kendramni robotic hat vaprun prakria otomatik kortat. Maruti Suzuki sarkhea zageanim bhari gunthovnuk kelya, somestponni utpadokta sumar 25% vaddoita, kiteak tori odik, hanvem tem Livemintacher vo kaslean vachlem. Ani "chalta hai" bhavna naka, hankaar?

unnormalised: Punn hem sogllem sooryachi kirnnam ani lollipops (vo *jalebis*, mhojea khyaalan) nhoi. Lokank kamanchi chinta asa, khas korun automation-an khup manual kamanchi zago gheunko shaktha dekhun. Vostranchem udhyeg, udahoronnak, lakhank lokank kam ditha, ani robots stitching-achem kam hatant gheunko shaktha. Ani tea soglleo sundor kakuyo jeo sarees itle bhagelean embroider kortat tanchim kitem? üò≠
normalised: Punn hem soglem suryachim kirnnam ani lollipops (vo jalebio, mhaka dista) nhoi. Lokank kamank lagun chinta asa, khas korun automation-an dher mann'sache kastachea kamanchi zago gheuncho asa. Textile udyog, udahoronnak, lakho lokank kam dita, ani robots stitching sarkeo vostu karunk xokta. Ani teo soglleo sundor auntie jeo sareecher itlem borem embroidary kortat tankam kitem zatlem? Roaddam
text: Punn hem sogllem sooryachi kirnnam ani lollipops (vo *jalebis*, mhojea khyaalan) nhoi. Lokank kamanchi chinta asa, khas korun automation-an khup manual kamanchi zago gheunko shaktha dekhun. Vostranchem udhyeg, udahoronnak, lakhank lokank kam ditha, ani robots stitching-achem kam hatant gheunko shaktha. Ani tea soglleo sundor kakuyo jeo sarees itle bhagelean embroider kortat tanchim kitem? üò≠

unnormalised: Ani asa puro AI netikacho prosn, zo ekdom *damaal*! Kiteak zata zalear ek robot tharaita *aloo paratha* *paneer tikka* poros chodd borem ani jevnacher bandi ghalunk lagta? (Borem, tem ek vinodi... chodd korun). Punn gambhirtayen, amkam ghott kayde zai he bots fatravonk vochonk nant ani hakk magunk lagta nant mhonn tharavnk. Kalpona korunk xoktat? Robot Union hartal! Dharna Jantar Mantar-ant! "Hum chai, hum samosa chahiye!"
normalised: Ani asa ti poori A-I ethics-chi question, ji ekdum damaal aahe! Robot-an tharavle ki aloo paratha paneer tikka-poros chodd boro, ani jevnna-chem rationing suru kelem mhunnlear kitem? (Thik aahe, tem ek joke‚Ä¶ chodd korun). Pun ozbiljno, apnnak sakht niyam zai asat techakhatir ki hi bots rogue zaunk naani ani hakkanchem magnem korunk naani. Tumhi kalpna korunk xoktat? Robot Union strike! Dharna Jantar Mantar-ar! "Hum chai, hum samosa chahiye!"
text: Ani asa puro AI netikacho prosn, zo ekdom *damaal*! Kiteak zata zalear ek robot tharaita *aloo paratha* *paneer tikka* poros chodd borem ani jevnacher bandi ghalunk lagta? (Borem, tem ek vinodi... chodd korun). Punn gambhirtayen, amkam ghott kayde zai he bots fatravonk vochonk nant ani hakk magunk lagta nant mhonn tharavnk. Kalpona korunk xoktat? Robot Union hartal! Dharna Jantar Mantar-ant! "Hum chai, hum samosa chahiye!"

unnormalised: Khoinchik tori, hea sogllea fancy techak ek motta kimatik lagta. Ami lakhs rupyanchea babatin uloitat, ek sadhea industrial robotak legit, tim sambhallun dovornneacho khorch soddun. Ani hea vostunni bigod zatkoch te tika korpak proxikshit technician khoim asat? Kalpana kor, tum productionachya madhyant asa ani tumcho mukhel welding robot achank 2:30 PM-ak *chai* break gheunk sodhta. Gondoll!
text: Khoinchik tori, hea sogllea fancy techak ek motta kimatik lagta. Ami lakhs rupyanchea babatin uloitat, ek sadhea industrial robotak legit, tim sambhallun dovornneacho khorch soddun. Ani hea vostunni bigod zatkoch te tika korpak proxikshit technician khoim asat? Kalpana kor, tum productionachya madhyant asa ani tumcho mukhel welding robot achank 2:30 PM-ak *chai* break gheunk sodhta. Gondoll!

normalised: Teeka, robot-amchea chae ani samoshe chori korchona (zait). Punn te amche jivit ani kaam korpachi pod'dot bodltole. Tem amchea hatant asa ki ami tem bodol pozitiv aasa mhunn sure korunk, eka dystopian sopnant na jithe robots sonvsaracher raj kortat ani amkam Bollywood filmam cholis ghodiam saat dis pollovonk zor kortat. Mhunnlear, kaim Bollywood filmam khub bore aasat, punn tumkam mhaka kiteak sangonk zai.
